00058 const int HaloTypeTotal = 5;
00059 const int ParticleTypeTotal = 6;
00060 
00067 template < typename T > T byteorder(T v) {
00068   T val;
00069   (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&val))[3] =
00070     (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&v))[0];
00071   (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&val))[2] =
00072     (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&v))[1];
00073   (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&val))[1] =
00074     (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&v))[2];
00075   (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&val))[0] =
00076     (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&v))[3];
00077   return val;
00078 }

00087 void
00088 GetOffsets(unsigned* ParticleIDOffsets, unsigned* npart)
00089 {
00090   std::cout << " in GetOffsets..." << std::endl;
00091   std::cout << "offsets: ";
00092   for (int x = 0; x < ParticleTypeTotal; ++x) {
00093     ParticleIDOffsets[x] = std::accumulate(&npart[0], &npart[x], 0);
00094     std::cout << ParticleIDOffsets[x] << " ";
00095   }
00096   std::cout << std::endl;
00097 }
00098 
00110 void 
00111 readDataBlocks(int isnap, int TotalNOParticles,
00112            int* & id, real* & pos, real* & vel, real* & mass){
00113   std::cout << " in ReadDataBlocks..." << std::endl;
00114   FILE *SnapshotFile = 0;
00115   std::string SnapshotFilename = Folder("snaps")+Snaps(isnap);
00116   SnapshotFile = fopen(SnapshotFilename.c_str(), "r");
00117   int n = 0;
00118   n = read_gadget_1((int *) id, "ID  ", SnapshotFile);
00119   
00120   float *ftemp = new float[3 * TotalNOParticles];
00121   n = read_gadget_3(ftemp, "POS ", SnapshotFile);
00122   for (int ii = 0; ii < 3 * n; ++ii)
00123     pos[ii] = ftemp[ii];
00124   
00125   n = read_gadget_3(ftemp, "VEL ", SnapshotFile);
00126   for (int ii = 0; ii < 3 * n; ++ii)
00127     vel[ii] = ftemp[ii];
00128   
00129   n = read_gadget_1(ftemp, "MASS", SnapshotFile);
00130   for (int ii = 0; ii < n; ++ii)
00131     mass[ii] = ftemp[ii];
00132   
00133   delete[] ftemp;
00134   fclose(SnapshotFile);
00135 }

00144 void 
00145 openParticlesFile(unsigned isnap, std::ifstream & ParticlesFile){
00146   std::cout << " in openParticlesFile..." << std::endl;
00147   std::string SnapshotParticlesFilename =
00148     Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap) + "/ahf_out_particles";
00149   ParticlesFile.open(SnapshotParticlesFilename.c_str(),
00150              std::ios_base::in | std::ios_base::binary);
00151 }

00162 void
00163 ReadSnapIdType(std::ifstream & ParticlesFile, 
00164            unsigned HaloPopulation,
00165            unsigned* & pid, int* & ptype){
00166   std::cout << " in ReadSnapIdType..." << std::endl;
00167   unsigned dummy_uns;
00168   int dummy_int;
00169   for (unsigned i = 0; i < HaloPopulation; ++i) {
00170     ParticlesFile >> dummy_uns;
00171     ParticlesFile >> dummy_int;
00172     pid[i] = dummy_uns;
00173     ptype[i] = dummy_int;
00174   }
00175 }

00189 void
00190 GenerateHalo(std::ifstream & ParticlesFile,
00191          unsigned HaloPopulation,
00192          const std::map<int,unsigned>& DoubleIndexMapi,
00193          real* pos,  real* vel,  real* mass,
00194          real* hpos, real* hvel, real* hmass, int* htype){
00195   std::cout << " in GenerateHalo..." << std::endl;
00196   std::cout << " * * Reading id, type from _particles..." << std::endl;
00197   unsigned *pid   = new unsigned[HaloPopulation];
00198   int      *ptype = new int[HaloPopulation];
00199   ReadSnapIdType(ParticlesFile, HaloPopulation, pid, ptype);
00200   
00201   std::cout << " * * copying pos,vel,mass,type..." << std::endl;
00202   for (unsigned k = 0; k < HaloPopulation; ++k) {
00203     unsigned offset  = DoubleIndexMapi.find(pid[k])->second;
00204     
00205     hmass[k] = mass[offset];
00206     htype[k] = ptype[k];
00207     for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00208       hpos[3*k+i] = pos[3*offset+i];
00209       hvel[3*k+i] = vel[3*offset+i];
00210     }
00211   }
00212   delete[] pid;
00213   delete[] ptype;
00214 }
00215 
00224 void
00225 GenerateDIM(unsigned TotalNOParticles,
00226         int* & id,
00227         std::map<int,unsigned>& DIM){
00228   std::cout << " in GenerateDoubleIndexMap..." << std::endl;
00229   for (unsigned j = 0; j < TotalNOParticles; ++j)
00230     DIM.insert(std::make_pair(id[j], j));
00231 }
00232 
00239 void 
00240 AnalyzeSnap(unsigned isnap)
00241 {
00243   // preparation
00245   
00246   unsigned TotalNOParticles, npart[ParticleTypeTotal];
00247   unsigned id_min[ParticleTypeTotal], id_max[ParticleTypeTotal];
00248   double Z, BL;
00249   double masses[ParticleTypeTotal];
00250   get_particle_number((Folder("snaps")+Snaps(isnap)).c_str(), 
00251               id_min, id_max, masses,
00252               npart, TotalNOParticles, Z, BL);
00253   
00254   std::ifstream ParticlesFile;
00255   openParticlesFile(isnap, ParticlesFile);
00256   
00257   unsigned nhalo = 0;
00258   ParticlesFile >> nhalo;
00259   std::cout << nhalo << " halos totally." << std::endl;
00260   
00261   int  *id   = new int [TotalNOParticles];
00262   real *pos  = new real[3*TotalNOParticles];
00263   real *vel  = new real[3*TotalNOParticles];
00264   real *mass = new real[TotalNOParticles];  //, * temp, * u, * rho;
00265   readDataBlocks(isnap,
00266          TotalNOParticles, 
00267          id, pos, vel, mass);
00268   
00269   std::map<int,unsigned> DoubleIndexMap;
00270   GenerateDIM(TotalNOParticles, id, DoubleIndexMap);
00271   
00272   real msimtot=0.0;
00273   for(unsigned i=0; i<TotalNOParticles; ++i){
00274     msimtot += mass[i];
00275   }
00276   Simulation sim;
00277   sim.setIsnap(isnap);
00278   sim.setZsnap(Z);
00279   sim.setTarkinOmega();
00280   sim.setMass(msimtot);
00281   sim.setBoxlength(BL);
00282   sim.setNhalo(nhalo);
00283   Output out(sim);
00284   /* big loop over all halos */
00285   for (unsigned hit = 0;
00286        hit < nhalo;
00287        ++hit) {
00288     std::cout << "Halo " << hit << std::endl;
00289     std::cout << "+++++++++++++" << std::endl;
00290     
00291     unsigned npart;
00292     ParticlesFile >> npart;
00293     std::cout << "Halo population = " << npart << std::endl;
00294 
00295     int  *htype = new int [npart];
00296     real *hpos  = new real[3*npart];
00297     real *hvel  = new real[3*npart];
00298     real *hmass = new real[npart];
00299     GenerateHalo(ParticlesFile, npart, DoubleIndexMap,
00300          &pos[0], &vel[0], &mass[0],
00301          &hpos[0],&hvel[0],&hmass[0],&htype[0]);
00302     
00303     std::cout << " * * Creating halo from " << npart;
00304     std::cout << " particles" << std::endl;
00305     
00306     Halo halo;
00307     halo = Halo(sim, hpos, hvel, mass, htype, npart);
00308     
00309 #if 0 // if true: exclude unbound particles with procedure from Halo
00310     writelndebug(DEBUG, " * * Cleaning unbound particles...");
00311     std::vector < bool > exc(npart);
00312     halo.CleanUnboundExc(Boxsize, exc);
00313     std::vector < bool > excs(npart);
00314     halo.CleanUnboundSimple(Boxsize, excs);
00315     std::cout << std::endl;
00316 #else   // change all following calculations such that they have an exclusion list available
00317 #warning No additional exclusion of unbound particles!
00318 #endif
00319     
00320     /**************************************************
00321      * properties of halo consisting of all particles *
00322      **************************************************/
00323       real Mtot = halo.getMtot();
00324       real Rtot = halo.getRtot();
00325       Vector3 xcm = halo.getXCM();
00326       Vector3 vcm = halo.getVCM();
00327       Vector3 xmb = halo.getXMB();
00328       Vector3 vmb = halo.getVMB();
00329       real Rvir = halo.getRvir();
00330       real Mvir = halo.getMvir();
00331       std::cout << " * * Total mass:           " << Mtot << std::endl;
00332       std::cout << " * * maximal radius:       " << Rtot << std::endl;
00333       std::cout << " * * Center of mass:       " << xcm << std::endl;
00334       std::cout << " * * Center velocity:      " << vcm << std::endl;
00335       std::cout << " * * pos_mostbound:        " << xmb << std::endl;
00336       std::cout << " * * vel_mostbound:        " << vmb << std::endl;
00337       std::cout << " * * virial properties:    ";
00338       std::cout << "Rvir = " << Rvir << ", Mvir = " << Mvir << std::endl;
00339       std::cout << std::endl;
00340 
00341       out.fillHRglobal(npart,Mtot,Rtot,Mvir,Rvir,xcm,vcm,xmb,vmb);
00342 
00352       int ht[5] = {15, 3, 4, 8, 12};
00353       std::string hts[5] = {"all", "dm", "gas", "stars", "visible"};
00354       
00355       for(int type = 0; type<5; ++type){
00356     std::cout << " halo type: " << hts[type] << std::endl;
00357 
00358     std::cout << " * * Number of particles:          ";
00359     int npart = halo.calcNpart(ht[type]);
00360     std::cout << npart << std::endl;
00361 
00362     std::cout << " * * Mass of particles:            ";
00363     real mpart = halo.calcMpart(ht[type]);
00364     std::cout << mpart << std::endl;
00365 
00366     std::cout << " * * Angular momentum:             ";
00367     Vector3 J = halo.calcJ(ht[type]);
00368     std::cout << J << std::endl;
00369     
00370     std::cout << " * * Lambda':                      ";
00371     real lambda = halo.calcLambda(ht[type]);
00372     std::cout << lambda << std::endl;
00373     
00374     std::cout << " * * sigma:                        ";
00375     real sigma = halo.calcSigma(ht[type]);
00376     std::cout << sigma << std::endl;
00377     
00378     std::cout << " * * Axes...                       ";
00379     Eigensystem3 E  = halo.calcShape(ht[type]);
00380     std::cout << E.getEval().at(0) << ",";
00381     std::cout << E.getEval().at(1) << ",";
00382     std::cout << E.getEval().at(2) << std::endl;
00383 
00384     out.fillHRtype(type, npart, mpart, lambda, sigma, J, E);
00385       }
00386 
00387       std::cout << " * * Deleting arrays from halo..." << std::endl;
00388       delete[] hpos;
00389       delete[] hvel;
00390       delete[] hmass;
00391       delete[] htype;
00392 
00393       out.appendHR();
00394 
00395       //      int goon;
00396       //      std::cin >> goon;
00397   } // next Halo
00398   
00399   /* cleaning */
00400   delete[] id;
00401   delete[] pos;
00402   delete[] vel;
00403   delete[] mass;
00404   ParticlesFile.close();
00405   
00406   out.writeHR();
00407   out.writeHRstripped();
00408   
00409   writeln("Success.");
00410   return;
00411 }
